findings.title: PTRP - Potential Transfer Revert Propagation
findings.description: The contract sends funds to a marketingWallet and devWallet as part of the transfer flow, which may revert from incoming payment.

findings.title: DDP - Decimal Division Precision
findings.description: Division of decimal (fixed point) numbers can result in rounding errors due to the way that division is implemented in Solidity.

findings.title: MC - Missing Check
findings.description: The contract is processing arguments that have not been properly sanitized and checked that they form the proper shape.

findings.title: CO - Code Optimization
findings.description: There are code segments that could be optimized to reduce runtime cost.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are not properly triggered and logged within the contract.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: The order of operations in arithmetic calculations may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Using an uninitialized local variable can lead to unpredictable behavior.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured on user-supplied input without proper checks.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The pragma is not locked, which may lead to compatibility issues with different Solidity compiler versions.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods do not check if the result is successful according to the ERC20 specification.
